reviewText:
A story of man who usually fails at anything he attempts to do, and is trying to live up his mentor, Marshal Jim Crown.  He puts his life in jeporady trying to hunt down a prisoner that excaped due to his negligence.  Another well written story with a alot of suspense and action.  Two very fine actors are in the supporting cast, Harry Dean Stanton and Suzanne Pleshette.

I recommend it!

John E. Matty, Springfield, VA.
